nodes.text: A jail was located in Gorse City, capital of the planet Gorse. After the industrialist Denetrius Vidian murdered the Besalisk Lal Grallik, her husband Gord Grallik and his cousins attempted to arrest Vidian and the Imperial Captain Rae Sloane and take them to the jail. Grallik was unsuccessful in detaining the pair, however, and was instead killed.
The jail was first mentioned in A New Dawn, a novel written by John Jackson Miller and released in 2015.
